title: 5 Times Table
description:
Use a for loop to print the 5 times table.

Loop from i = 1 to i = 5
Each iteration, print: i * 5

Expected output:
5
10
15
20
25
instructions:

hints.text: Use IO.println() to display output to the console.
Use a for loop or while loop to repeat the operation.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
